name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers

reviews.name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers
reviews.reviewText: My husband says these are very comfortable, warm and soft. He loves them.
reviews.title: My husband Loves these

reviews.name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers
reviews.reviewText: Very plush lining and thick sole. Warm and true to size. Nice pair of stompers for the money!
reviews.title: Comfy Cozy!

reviews.name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers
reviews.reviewText: My husband is such a creature of habit and hates change, but I convinced him to try these on and now they are his favorite.
reviews.title: Great comfort

reviews.name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers
reviews.reviewText: The slippers keep your feet warm, really soft and comfortable to wear all day
reviews.title: sssssoooo comfy

reviews.name: DF By Dearfoams Men's Microfiber Suede Clog Slippers
reviews.reviewText: I bought two pairs of these slippers for my 14 year old and 11 year old boys for Christmas. They love them, and I have to say I have worn them around and they are so comfortable. The inside is very soft and forms to the foot, the sole makes them a little better than your regular slippers. Overall, we just love them.
reviews.title: EXTRA COMFY!!
